name: Titanium.UI.iOS
summary: Apple iOS specific UI capabilities. All properties, methods and events in this namespace will only work on Apple iOS devices.

deprecated.notes: iAd has been deprecated in iOS 10 and SDK 5.5.0. It was removed as part of the SDK 7.0.0.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Titanium.UI.iOS.AdView except those marked not-creation or read-only.

methods.name: createLivePhotoBadge
methods.summary: Creates a live photo badge to be used together with the Titanium.UI.iOS.LivePhotoView API.

parameters.name: type
parameters.summary: Constant defining the live photo badge behavior.

methods.name: systemImage
methods.summary: Get image from SF Symbols provided by Apple.
methods.description: More details on SF Symbols can be found on https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/sf-symbols/overview. One can download SF Symbols app from https://developer.apple.com/design/downloads/SF-Symbols.dmg and use it to lookup the inbuilt SF Symbol name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.summary: Name of SF Symbol.

properties.name: appBadge
properties.summary: Value of the badge for the application's springboard icon.

properties.name: appSupportsShakeToEdit
properties.summary: Determines whether the shake to edit system-wide capability is enabled.

properties.name: forceTouchSupported
properties.summary: Determines if the 3D-Touch capability "Force Touch" is supported (true) or not (false) by the device.
properties.description: Returns true if the device supports 3D-Touch (iPhone 6S / iPhone 6S Plus and later) or false if not.

properties.name: statusBarBackgroundColor
properties.summary: Sets the global status bar background color for the application. Android does not support setting instances of Titanium.UI.Color

constants.name: ACTION_POLICY_ALLOW
constants.summary: Allow the navigation to continue.
constants.description: Use with invoke.

constants.name: ACTION_POLICY_CANCEL
constants.summary: Cancel the navigation.
constants.description: Use with invoke.

constants.name: AD_SIZE_LANDSCAPE
constants.summary: Use with adSize to specify a banner ad size appropriate for landscape orientations.
constants.description: Note that fullscreen ads always display in portrait orientation.

constants.name: AD_SIZE_PORTRAIT
constants.summary: Use with adSize to specify a banner ad size appropriate for portrait orientations.
constants.description: Note that fullscreen ads always display in portrait orientation.

constants.name: ANIMATION_CURVE_EASE_IN
constants.summary: Use with curve to specify an animation that starts slowly and speeds up.

constants.name: ANIMATION_CURVE_EASE_IN_OUT
constants.summary: Use with curve to specify an animation that starts slowly, and speeds up, then slows down at the end of the animation.

constants.name: ANIMATION_CURVE_EASE_OUT
constants.summary: Use with curve to specify an animation that starts quickly, then slows down at the end of the animation.

constants.name: ANIMATION_CURVE_LINEAR
constants.summary: Use with curve to specify an animation that proceeds at a constant rate.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_BACKGROUND_COLOR

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_BACKGROUND_COLOR constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to specify a background color.
constants.description:
Use a color name or hex value for value.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_BASELINE_OFFSET

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_BASELINE_OFFSET constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to apply a different baseline to the text.
constants.description:
Set value to a number to specify how many pixels to raise or lower the text.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_EXPANSION

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_EXPANSION constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to stretch the text horizontally.
constants.description:
Set value to a float value to specify how much to stretch the text.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_FONT

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_FONT constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to specify a font.
constants.description:
Use a Font dictionary for value.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_FOREGROUND_COLOR

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_FOREGROUND_COLOR constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to specify a font color.
constants.description:
Use a color name or hex value for value.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_KERN

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_KERN constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to specify kerning (space between characters).
constants.description:
Set value to a float value specifying how many pixels to increase the character spacing.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LETTERPRESS_STYLE

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_LETTERPRESS_STYLE constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to use a letterpress text effect.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_TEXT_EFFECT.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LIGATURE

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_LIGATURE constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to enable or disable ligatures.
constants.description:
Set value to 1 to enable ligatures, else 0 to disable. Ligatures are only supported on certain fonts.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LINK

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_LINK constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to create a link.
constants.description:
Set value to a URL.

Use the Label's link event to determine when the user triggers a long press (not a click) event on the linked text.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_OBLIQUENESS

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_OBLIQUENESS constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to skew the text.
constants.description:
Set value to a float value to specify how much to skew the text.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_SHADOW

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_SHADOW constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to display a shadow behind the text.
constants.description:
Set value to a shadowDict dictionary.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_COLOR

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_COLOR constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to change the color of the horizontal line.
constants.description:
Use a color name or hex value for value.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to place a horizontal line through the text.
constants.description:
Set the value property to a Titanium.UI.iOS.ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_* constant.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_STROKE_COLOR

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_STROKE_COLOR constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to specify a color for the stroke text.
constants.description:
Use a color name or hex value for the value property in the attributes dictionary.

See Attribute for more information on type modes.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_STROKE_WIDTH

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_STROKE_WIDTH constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to specify the width of the stroke text.
constants.description:
Set value to a float value specifying the size of stroke width as a percentage of the font size. A positive value displays an outline of the charater, while a negative value fills the character.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_TEXT_EFFECT

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_TEXT_EFFECT constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to apply a text effect.
constants.description:
Set value to Titainium.UI.iOS.ATTRIBUTE_LETTERPRESS_STYLE to apply a letterpress effect to the text.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_BY_WORD

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_BY_WORD constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to draw a line only underneath or through words.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_COLOR

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_COLOR constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to change the color of the horizontal line.
constants.description:
Use a color name or hex value for value.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DASH

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DASH constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to draw a dashed line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DASH_DOT

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DASH_DOT constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to draw an alternating line of dashes and dots.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DASH_DOT_DOT

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DASH_DOT_DOT constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to draw an alternating line of dashes and two dots.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DOT

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DOT constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to draw a dotted line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_SOLID

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_SOLID constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to draw a solid line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_DOUBLE

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_DOUBLE constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to draw a double line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_NONE

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_NONE constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to not draw a line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_SINGLE

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_SINGLE constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to draw a single line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_THICK

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_THICK constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to draw a thick line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to place a horizontal line under the text.
constants.description:
Set the value property to a Titanium.UI.iOS.ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_* constant.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with type to control the direction of the text.
constants.description:
Set value to a Titanium.UI.iOS.ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_* constant.

See Attribute for more information on type modes.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_EMBEDDING

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_EMBEDDING constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to use the embedded text direction.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_LEFT_TO_RIGHT

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_LEFT_TO_RIGHT constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to write text left to right.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_NATURAL

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_NATURAL constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to use the Unicode Bidirection Algorithm rules P2 and P3 to determine which direction to use.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_OVERRIDE

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_OVERRIDE constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to override the text direction.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_RIGHT_TO_LEFT

deprecated.notes: Use the ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_RIGHT_TO_LEFT constant instead (without the iOS namespace).

constants.summary: Use with value to write text right to left.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: AUDIOVISUAL_MEDIA_TYPE_ALL
constants.summary: All media types require a user gesture to begin playing.
constants.description: Use with mediaTypesRequiringUserActionForPlayback

constants.name: AUDIOVISUAL_MEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO
constants.summary: Media types containing audio require a user gesture to begin playing.
constants.description: Use with mediaTypesRequiringUserActionForPlayback

constants.name: AUDIOVISUAL_MEDIA_TYPE_NONE
constants.summary: No media types require a user gesture to begin playing.
constants.description: Use with mediaTypesRequiringUserActionForPlayback

constants.name: AUDIOVISUAL_MEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO
constants.summary: Media types containing video require a user gesture to begin playing.
constants.description: Use with mediaTypesRequiringUserActionForPlayback

constants.name: AUTODETECT_ADDRESS
constants.summary: Converts strings formatted as addresses into clickable links.

constants.name: AUTODETECT_ALL
constants.summary: Converts all detectable types of data into clickable links.

constants.name: AUTODETECT_CALENDAR
constants.summary: Converts strings formatted as calendar events into clickable links.

constants.name: AUTODETECT_LINK
constants.summary: Converts strings formatted as URLs into clickable links.

constants.name: AUTODETECT_NONE
constants.summary: Disables converting strings into clickable links.

constants.name: AUTODETECT_PHONE
constants.summary: Converts strings formatted as phone numbers into clickable links.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_DARK
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. The area of the view is darker in hue than the underlying view.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_EXTRA_LIGHT
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. The area of the view is lighter in hue than the underlying view.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_LIGHT
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. The area of the view is the same approximate hue of the underlying view.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_PROMINENT
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. The area of the view is presented more prominent than the underlying view.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_REGULAR
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. The blurring effect is the default one specified in iOS 10.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_CHROME_MATERIAL
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This is an adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of the system chrome.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_CHROME_MATERIAL_DARK
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This blur effect creates the appearance of an ultra-thin material and is always dark.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_CHROME_MATERIAL_LIGHT
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This blur effect creates the appearance of the system chrome and is always light.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_MATERIAL
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This is an adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of a material with normal thickness.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_MATERIAL_DARK
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This blur effect creates the appearance of a thin material and is always dark.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_MATERIAL_LIGHT
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This blur effect creates the appearance of a material with normal thickness and is always light.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THICK_MATERIAL
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This is an adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of a material that is thicker than normal.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THICK_MATERIAL_DARK
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This blur effect creates the appearance of a material with normal thickness and is always dark.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THICK_MATERIAL_LIGHT
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This blur effect creates the appearance of a material that is thicker than normal and is always light.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THIN_MATERIAL
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This is an adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of a thin material.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THIN_MATERIAL_DARK
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This blur effect creates the appearance of a material that is thicker than normal and is always dark.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_THIN_MATERIAL_LIGHT
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This blur effect creates the appearance of a thin material and is always light.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_ULTRA_THIN_MATERIAL
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This is an adaptable blur effect that creates the appearance of a material with normal thickness.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_ULTRA_THIN_MATERIAL_DARK
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This blur effect creates the appearance of the system chrome and is always dark.

constants.name: BLUR_EFFECT_STYLE_SYSTEM_ULTRA_THIN_MATERIAL_LIGHT
constants.summary: Use with effect to specify a blur effect.
constants.description: Creates a blurring effect in the view. This blur effect creates the appearance of an ultra-thin material and is always light.

constants.name: CACHE_POLICY_RELOAD_IGNORING_LOCAL_CACHE_DATA
constants.summary: Specifies that the data for the URL load should be loaded from the originating source. No existing cache data should be used to satisfy a URL load request.
constants.description: Use with cachePolicy.

constants.name: CACHE_POLICY_RETURN_CACHE_DATA_DONT_LOAD
constants.summary: Specifies that the existing cache data should be used to satisfy a request, regardless of its age or expiration date.
constants.description: Use with cachePolicy. If there is no existing data in the cache corresponding to a URL load request, no attempt is made to load the data from the originating source, and the load is considered to have failed. This constant specifies a behavior that is similar to an offline mode.

constants.name: CACHE_POLICY_RETURN_CACHE_DATA_ELSE_LOAD
constants.summary: Specifies that the existing cached data should be used to satisfy the request, regardless of its age or expiration date.
constants.description: Use with cachePolicy. If there is no existing data in the cache corresponding the request, the data is loaded from the originating source.

constants.name: CACHE_POLICY_USE_PROTOCOL_CACHE_POLICY
constants.summary: Specifies that the caching logic defined in the protocol implementation, if any, is used for a particular URL load request.
constants.description: Use with cachePolicy. This is the default policy for URL load requests. If you are making HTTP or HTTPS byte-range requests, always use the CACHE_POLICY_RELOAD_IGNORING_LOCAL_CACHE_DATA policy.

constants.name: CLIP_MODE_DEFAULT
constants.summary: Use with clipMode to specify clipping behavior.

constants.name: CLIP_MODE_DISABLED
constants.summary: Use with clipMode to specify clipping behavior.

constants.name: CLIP_MODE_ENABLED
constants.summary: Use with clipMode to specify clipping behavior.

constants.name: COLLISION_MODE_ALL
constants.summary: Use with collisionMode to specify collisions with both items and boundaries.

constants.name: COLLISION_MODE_BOUNDARY
constants.summary: Use with collisionMode to specify collisions with boundaries only.

constants.name: COLLISION_MODE_ITEM
constants.summary: Use with collisionMode to specify collisions with items only.

constants.name: CREDENTIAL_PERSISTENCE_FOR_SESSION
constants.summary: Credential should be stored only for this session.
constants.description: Used with the persistence argument of setBasicAuthentication to set the persistence level.

constants.name: CREDENTIAL_PERSISTENCE_NONE
constants.summary: Credential should not be stored.
constants.description: Used with the persistence argument of setBasicAuthentication to set the persistence level.

constants.name: CREDENTIAL_PERSISTENCE_PERMANENT
constants.summary: Credential should be stored in the keychain.
constants.description: Used with the persistence argument of setBasicAuthentication to set the persistence level.

constants.name: CREDENTIAL_PERSISTENCE_SYNCHRONIZABLE
constants.summary: Credential should be stored permanently in the keychain, and in addition should be distributed to other devices based on the owning AppleID.
constants.description: Used with the persistence argument of setBasicAuthentication to set the persistence level.

constants.name: FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_IMPACT_STYLE_HEAVY
constants.summary: The heavy impact style used as the style argument when creating a Titanium.UI.iOS.FeedbackGenerator with the type FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_TYPE_IMPACT.

constants.name: FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_IMPACT_STYLE_LIGHT
constants.summary: The light impact style used as the style argument when creating a Titanium.UI.iOS.FeedbackGenerator with the type FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_TYPE_IMPACT.

constants.name: FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_IMPACT_STYLE_MEDIUM
constants.summary: The medium impact style used as the style argument when creating a Titanium.UI.iOS.FeedbackGenerator with the type FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_TYPE_IMPACT.

constants.name: FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ERROR
constants.summary: The error notification type used as the argument in notificationOccurred.

constants.name: FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_NOTIFICATION_TYPE_SUCCESS
constants.summary: The success notification type used as the argument in notificationOccurred.

constants.name: FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_NOTIFICATION_TYPE_WARNING
constants.summary: The warning notification type used as the argument in notificationOccurred.

constants.name: FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_TYPE_IMPACT
constants.summary: The feedback type to be used when specifying an impact in Titanium.UI.iOS.FeedbackGenerator.

constants.name: FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_TYPE_NOTIFICATION
constants.summary: The feedback type to be used when specifying a received notification in Titanium.UI.iOS.FeedbackGenerator.

constants.name: FEEDBACK_GENERATOR_TYPE_SELECTION
constants.summary: The feedback type to be used when specifying a selection in Titanium.UI.iOS.FeedbackGenerator.

constants.name: INJECTION_TIME_DOCUMENT_END
constants.summary: Inject the script after the document finishes loading, but before other subresources finish loading.
constants.description: Used to set the injectionTime argument of addUserScript.

constants.name: INJECTION_TIME_DOCUMENT_START
constants.summary: Inject the script after the document element is created, but before any other content is loaded.
constants.description: Used to set the injectionTime argument of addUserScript.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_DISMISS_MODE_INTERACTIVE
constants.summary: Use with keyboardDismissMode to control keyboard dismiss mode.
constants.description: The keyboard follows the dragging touch offscreen, and can be pulled upward again to cancel the dismiss.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_DISMISS_MODE_NONE
constants.summary: Use with keyboardDismissMode to control keyboard dismiss mode.
constants.description: The keyboard does not get dismissed with a drag.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_DISMISS_MODE_ON_DRAG
constants.summary: Use with keyboardDismissMode to control keyboard dismiss mode.
constants.description: The keyboard is dismissed when a drag begins.

constants.name: LARGE_TITLE_DISPLAY_MODE_ALWAYS
constants.summary: Always use a larger title when this item is top most.
constants.description: Use with largeTitleDisplayMode.

constants.name: LARGE_TITLE_DISPLAY_MODE_AUTOMATIC
constants.summary: Automatically use the large out-of-line title based on the state of the p revious item in the navigation bar.
constants.description: Use with largeTitleDisplayMode. An item with this constant will show or hide the large title based on the request of the previous navigation item. If the first item pushed is set to Automatic, then it will show the large title if the navigation bar has the property largeTitleEnabled set to true.

constants.name: LARGE_TITLE_DISPLAY_MODE_NEVER
constants.summary: Never use a larger title when this item is top most.
constants.description: Use with largeTitleDisplayMode.

constants.name: LIVEPHOTO_BADGE_OPTIONS_LIVE_OFF
constants.summary: To indicate that the Live Photo aspect is turned off and it will be treated as a still (e.g. for sharing).
constants.description: Use with createLivePhotoBadge to specify the badge behavior.

constants.name: LIVEPHOTO_BADGE_OPTIONS_OVER_CONTENT
constants.summary: Include treatments so this image can be shown directly over the content of the Live Photo.
constants.description: Use with createLivePhotoBadge to specify the badge behavior.

constants.name: LIVEPHOTO_PLAYBACK_STYLE_FULL
constants.summary: Plays back the entire motion and sound content of the Live Photo, including transition effects at the start and end.
constants.description: This style matches the effect seen when pressing on a photo in the Photos app.

constants.name: LIVEPHOTO_PLAYBACK_STYLE_HINT
constants.summary: Plays back only a brief section of the motion content of the Live Photo, without sound.
constants.description: This style matches the effect seen in various iOS interface elements for hinting to the user when an asset contains Live Photo content.

constants.name: MENU_POPUP_ARROW_DIRECTION_DEFAULT
constants.summary: An arrow that is automatically aligned.

constants.name: MENU_POPUP_ARROW_DIRECTION_DOWN
constants.summary: An arrow that points downward.

constants.name: MENU_POPUP_ARROW_DIRECTION_LEFT
constants.summary: An arrow that points toward the left.

constants.name: MENU_POPUP_ARROW_DIRECTION_RIGHT
constants.summary: An arrow that points toward the right.

constants.name: MENU_POPUP_ARROW_DIRECTION_UP
constants.summary: An arrow that points upward.

constants.name: MODAL_PRESENTATION_CURRENT_CONTEXT
constants.summary: View presented with the same style as its parent window.
constants.description:
Used with the open and close methods.

One of the group of modal window presentation style constants MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_FULL_SCREEN, MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FORMSHEET, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FULLSCREEN, and MODAL_PRESENTATION_PAGESHEET.

constants.name: MODAL_PRESENTATION_FORMSHEET
constants.summary: Window width and height are smaller than those of the screen and the view is centered on the screen.
constants.description:
If the system is in a landscape orientation and the keyboard is visible, the position of the view is adjusted upward so that the view remains visible. All uncovered areas are dimmed and do not respond to touch to prevent the user from interacting with them.

Used with the open and close methods.

One of the group of modal window presentation style constants MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_FULL_SCREEN, MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FORMSHEET, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FULLSCREEN, and MODAL_PRESENTATION_PAGESHEET.

constants.name: MODAL_PRESENTATION_FULLSCREEN
constants.summary: Window covers the screen.
constants.description:
Used with the open and close methods.

One of the group of modal window presentation style constants MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_FULL_SCREEN, MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FORMSHEET, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FULLSCREEN, and MODAL_PRESENTATION_PAGESHEET.

constants.name: MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_CONTEXT
constants.summary: View presented over its parent window.
constants.description:
Used with the open and close methods.

One of the group of modal window presentation style constants MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_FULL_SCREEN, MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FORMSHEET, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FULLSCREEN, and MODAL_PRESENTATION_PAGESHEET.

constants.name: MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_FULL_SCREEN
constants.summary: Presented view covers the screen.
constants.description:
The views beneath the presented content are not removed from the view hierarchy when the presentation finishes. So if the presented view controller does not fill the screen with opaque content, the underlying content shows through.

Used with the open and close methods.

One of the group of modal window presentation style constants MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_FULL_SCREEN, MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FORMSHEET, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FULLSCREEN, and MODAL_PRESENTATION_PAGESHEET.

constants.name: MODAL_PRESENTATION_PAGESHEET
constants.summary: Window height is the height of the screen and width is equal to screen width in a portrait orientation.
constants.description:
Any uncovered areas are dimmed and do not respond to touch, to prevent the user from interacting with them. In portrait orientations, this option is essentially the same as MODAL_PRESENTATION_FULLSCREEN.

Used with the open and close methods.

One of the group of modal window presentation style constants MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_FULL_SCREEN, MODAL_PRESENTATION_OVER_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_CURRENT_CONTEXT, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FORMSHEET, MODAL_PRESENTATION_FULLSCREEN, and MODAL_PRESENTATION_PAGESHEET.

constants.name: MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_COVER_VERTICAL
constants.summary: When the window is presented, its view slides up from the bottom of the screen. On dismissal, the view slides back down (default.)
constants.description:
Used with the open and close methods.

One of the group of modal window transition style constants MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_COVER_VERTICAL, MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_CROSS_DISSOLVE, MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_FLIP_HORIZONTAL, and MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_PARTIAL_CURL.

constants.name: MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_CROSS_DISSOLVE
constants.summary: When the window is presented, the current view fades out while the new view fades in at the same time. On dismissal, a similar type of cross-fade is used to return to the original view.
constants.description:
Used with the open and close methods.

One of the group of modal window transition style constants MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_COVER_VERTICAL, MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_CROSS_DISSOLVE, MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_FLIP_HORIZONTAL, and MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_PARTIAL_CURL.

constants.name: MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_FLIP_HORIZONTAL
constants.summary: When the window is presented, the current view initiates a horizontal 3D flip from right-to-left, resulting in the revealing of the new view as if it were on the back of the previous view. On dismissal, the flip occurs from left-to-right, returning to the original view.
constants.description:
Used with the open and close methods.

One of the group of modal window transition style constants MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_COVER_VERTICAL, MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_CROSS_DISSOLVE, MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_FLIP_HORIZONTAL, and MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_PARTIAL_CURL.

constants.name: MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_PARTIAL_CURL
constants.summary: When the window is presented, one corner of the current view curls up to reveal the modal view underneath. On dismissal, the curled up page unfurls itself back on top of the modal view.
constants.description:
A modal view presented using this transition is itself prevented from presenting any additional modal views. This transition style is supported only if the window is presenting a MODAL_PRESENTATION_FULLSCREEN modal presentation style.

Used with the open and close methods.

One of the group of modal window transition style constants MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_COVER_VERTICAL, MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_CROSS_DISSOLVE, MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_FLIP_HORIZONTAL, and MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_PARTIAL_CURL.

constants.name: PREVIEW_ACTION_STYLE_DEFAULT
constants.summary: The normal style for preview actions.
constants.description: Used in conjunction with style / style property.

constants.name: PREVIEW_ACTION_STYLE_DESTRUCTIVE
constants.summary: The destructive style for preview actions.
constants.description: Used in conjunction with style / style property.

constants.name: PREVIEW_ACTION_STYLE_SELECTED
constants.summary: The selected style for preview actions.
constants.description: Used in conjunction with style / style property.

constants.name: PUSH_MODE_CONTINUOUS
constants.summary: Use with pushMode to specifiy a continuous force.

constants.name: PUSH_MODE_INSTANTANEOUS
constants.summary: Use with pushMode to specifiy an instantaneous force.

constants.name: ROW_ACTION_STYLE_DEFAULT
constants.summary: The default style for RowActionType.
constants.description: Used in conjunction with editActions property and editaction event.

constants.name: ROW_ACTION_STYLE_DESTRUCTIVE
constants.summary: The destructive style for RowActionType.
constants.description: Used in conjunction with editActions property and editaction event.

constants.name: ROW_ACTION_STYLE_NORMAL
constants.summary: The normal style for RowActionType.
constants.description: Used in conjunction with editActions property and editaction event.

constants.name: SCROLL_DECELERATION_RATE_FAST
constants.summary: Use with decelerationRate to control deceleration rate.

constants.name: SCROLL_DECELERATION_RATE_NORMAL
constants.summary: Use with decelerationRate to control deceleration rate.

constants.name: SEARCH_BAR_STYLE_MINIMAL
constants.summary: Use with style to change the search bar style.
constants.description: The search bar has no background, and the search field is translucent.

constants.name: SEARCH_BAR_STYLE_PROMINENT
constants.summary: Use with style to change the search bar style.
constants.description: The search bar has a translucent background, and the search field is opaque.

constants.name: SELECTION_GRANULARITY_CHARACTER
constants.summary: Selection endpoints can be placed at any character boundary.
constants.description: Use with selectionGranularity.

constants.name: SELECTION_GRANULARITY_DYNAMIC
constants.summary: Selection granularity varies automatically depending on the selection.
constants.description: Use with selectionGranularity.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_ADD
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that adds an item.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_ALARM
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers creation of an alarm.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_AUDIO
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers use of audio.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_BOOKMARK
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers creation of a bookmark.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_CAPTURE_PHOTO
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers photo capture.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_CAPTURE_VIDEO
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers video capture.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_CLOUD
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers cloud access.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_COMPOSE
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that lets a user compose new content.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_CONFIRMATION
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that indicates confirmation.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_CONTACT
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that chooses a generic contact.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_DATE
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers use of a calendar.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_FAVORITE
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that lets a user designate a favorite item.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_HOME
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that indicates home.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_INVITATION
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that indicates an invitation.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_LOCATION
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: Will cause a magnifying glass icon to be displayed at that location in the index. This should generally only be used as the first title in the index.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_LOVE
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that lets a user designate a loved item.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_MAIL
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers use of mail.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_MARK_LOCATION
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that lets a user mark a location.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_MESSAGE
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers use of messaging.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_PAUSE
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that pauses media playback.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_PLAY
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that plays media.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_PROHIBIT
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that disallows something.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_SEARCH
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that accesses the user's current location.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_SHARE
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers content sharing.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_SHUFFLE
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers shuffle mode.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_TASK
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers task creation.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_TASK_COMPLETED
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers task completion.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_TIME
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers use of a clock or timer.

constants.name: SHORTCUT_ICON_TYPE_UPDATE
constants.summary: Number that represents the icon used for the application shortcut
constants.description: An icon for a quick action that offers updating.

constants.name: TABLEVIEW_INDEX_SEARCH
constants.summary: String that represents the magnifying glass on the table view index bar
constants.description: Will cause a magnifying glass icon to be displayed at that location in the index. This should generally only be used as the first title in the index.

constants.name: WEBVIEW_NAVIGATIONTYPE_BACK_FORWARD

deprecated.notes: Not used with Titanium SDK 8.0.0 and later by replacing UIWebView with WKWebView.

constants.summary: User tapped the back or forward button.
constants.description:
Used with the beforeload event.

Corresponds to iOS UIWebView UIWebViewNavigationTypeBackForward.

constants.name: WEBVIEW_NAVIGATIONTYPE_FORM_RESUBMITTED

deprecated.notes: Not used with Titanium SDK 8.0.0 and later by replacing UIWebView with WKWebView.

constants.summary: User resubmitted a form.
constants.description:
Used with the beforeload event.

Corresponds to iOS UIWebView UIWebViewNavigationTypeFormResubmitted.

constants.name: WEBVIEW_NAVIGATIONTYPE_FORM_SUBMITTED

deprecated.notes: Not used with Titanium SDK 8.0.0 and later by replacing UIWebView with WKWebView.

constants.summary: User submitted a form.
constants.description:
Used with the beforeload event.

Corresponds to iOS UIWebView UIWebViewNavigationTypeFormSubmitted.

constants.name: WEBVIEW_NAVIGATIONTYPE_LINK_CLICKED

deprecated.notes: Not used with Titanium SDK 8.0.0 and later by replacing UIWebView with WKWebView.

constants.summary: User tapped a link.
constants.description:
Used with the beforeload event.

Corresponds to iOS UIWebView UIWebViewNavigationTypeLinkClicked.

constants.name: WEBVIEW_NAVIGATIONTYPE_OTHER

constants.description:
Used with the beforeload event.

Corresponds to iOS UIWebView UIWebViewNavigationTypeOther.

constants.name: WEBVIEW_NAVIGATIONTYPE_RELOAD

deprecated.notes: Not used with Titanium SDK 8.0.0 and later by replacing UIWebView with WKWebView.

constants.summary: User tapped the reload button.
constants.description:
Used with the beforeload event.

Corresponds to iOS UIWebView UIWebViewNavigationTypeReload.
